content: Implement true Whirlpool sqrtPrice parsing from on-chain account data (no CoinGecko fallback)
Test execution engine in OBSERVE_ONLY mode with real market conditions
Fix WebSocket real-time updates for live UI
Fix status pill consistency across all UI screens (centralize state management)
Add unit tests for pool math (constant-product formula, price calculations)
Add unit tests for PnL calculation (fee deductions, slippage haircut)
Implement basic inventory tracking (venue balances monitoring)
Build remaining UI screens: Execution Monitor, Inventory, Risk & Limits
Set up Prometheus alerting rules (staleness, connection loss, daily loss limit)
